question:
[Kent] and [Sharon] were married twenty years ago today, becoming husband and wife on a glorious spring day. [Sharon] went to her son [Brian]'s House [Rick] and his brother [Davis] always played pranks on each other [Davis] bought to dress for his father [Kent] [Brian] likes to watch baseball with his brother. His name is [Oliver]. [Sharon] took her son [Oliver] to school because he missed the bus.
Question: How is [Rick] related to [Sharon]?
